source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000010_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Earlier, on the Magna Glacies...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000010_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Un peu plus tôt, dans le Magna Glacies

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000020_REFUGEEMAN<tab>No...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000020_REFUGEEMAN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000030_REFUGEEMAN<tab>No, no... We were promised an escape... Not the same doom we fled...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000030_REFUGEEMAN<tab>Qu'est-ce que j'ai fait pour mériter ça<var 1D /var>!? On était venus là pour être sauvés<var 1D /var>! C'est pas juste<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000040_REFUGEEMAN<tab>Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000040_REFUGEEMAN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000050_FOURCHENAULT<tab>I shall not meet my final days here in this blasted waste.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000050_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Rah, l'apocalypse a bien choisi son moment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000060_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Calm yourselves! Your panic is our greatest enemy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000060_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Ne cédez pas à la panique<var 1D /var>! En position de défense<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000070_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Come, we must build a line of defense.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000070_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Arrêtez de courir dans tous les sens et suivez-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000080_FOURCHENAULT<tab>How...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000080_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Vous, ici...<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Leave the fighting to us, Father. You must lead the people to safety!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Père, les Héritiers sont avec vous<var 1D /var>! Continuez à guider les gens en lieu sûr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000100_ESTINIEN<tab>Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000100_ESTINIEN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000110_ESTINIEN<tab>Tsk.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000110_ESTINIEN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000120_ESTINIEN<tab>I can handle this pair. You...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000120_ESTINIEN<tab>Je m'occupe de ces gros tas. Ça ira, toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000130_ALPHINAUD<tab>Shall tend to the refugees. Let us be about it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000130_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aucun problème<var 1D /var>! Je me charge de soigner les réfugiés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000135_ESTINIEN<tab> Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000135_ESTINIEN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000140_ESTINIEN<tab>As you wish, my little lord!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000140_ESTINIEN<tab>Alphinaud, je compte sur toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000150_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Help! Someone, please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000150_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Au secours, aidez-nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000160_ALPHINAUD<tab>What...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000160_ALPHINAUD<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000170_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000170_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000180_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000180_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000190_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>No, no, n-no, don't! I don't want to die...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000190_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Pitié, je veux pas mourir...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000200_JULLUS<tab>(-???-)Forward! Let not a single fiend escape!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000200_JULLUS<tab>(-???-)Tous à l'attaque<var 1D /var>! Ne laissez aucun de ces monstres en vie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wait, that's...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ça alors...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000220_ALPHINAUD<tab>Jullus and the army! So, you've recovered, then!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000220_ALPHINAUD<tab>Jullus et ses compagnons d'armes<var 1D /var>! Ils sont donc com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment rétablis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000230_JULLUS<tab>In time enough to be of aid, for once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000230_JULLUS<tab>Je m'en serais voulu d'arriver trop tard une fois de plus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000240_JULLUS<tab>We can speak of it more later. For now, we must fight!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000240_JULLUS<tab>Battons-nous, camarades<var 1D /var>! Pour tous nos compatriotes qui ont la chance d'avoir la vie sauve<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000250_JULLUS<tab>To repay your salvation in kind─or with better.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000250_JULLUS<tab>Cette fois, c'est à nous de secourir nos alliés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000260_JULLUS<tab>For Garlemald has her pride!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000260_JULLUS<tab>Pour Garlemald, avec force et honneur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000270_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of that, I've no doubt!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000270_ALPHINAUD<tab>Allons leur donner un coup de main<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000280_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Good gods... Of all possible saviors, the imperial army?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000280_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Mais qu'est-ce qui se passe<var 1D /var>? Les Impériaux sont nos ennemis, pourtant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000290_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Oh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000290_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Hein...<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000300_ALISAIE<tab>I had hoped to take all of them down at once!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000300_ALISAIE<tab>Mince, j'ai pas réussi à tous les avoir d'un coup<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000310_GRAHATIA<tab>Think a withdrawal might be in order?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000310_GRAHATIA<tab>Et maintenant, Alisaie<var 1D /var>? On se rrreplie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000320_ALISAIE<tab>Sod that! You-know-who would never abandon these people to their fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000320_ALISAIE<tab>Hors de question<var 1D /var>! En attendant <var 1A 02 /var>son<var 1A 01 /var> retour, c'est à nous de protéger ce monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000330_ALISAIE<tab>To be devoured by their former friends─that'd be beyond cruel. These beasts must fall here and now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000330_ALISAIE<tab>Déjà que ces pauvres gens ont été transformés en monstres, on ne peut pas en plus les laisser faire du mal à leurs proches... Il faut les arrêter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000340_GRAHATIA<tab>Well then, I'd say it's high time we threw caution to the winds!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000340_GRAHATIA<tab>Tu as rrraison<var 1D /var>! À partir de maintenant, on donne tout ce qu'on a et advienne que pourra<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000350_ALISAIE<tab>So long as you spare me the heroic sacrifices.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000350_ALISAIE<tab>D'accord, mais fais quand même gaffe à pas tomber à court d'éther, hein<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000360_ALISAIE<tab>Now, let's go!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000360_ALISAIE<tab>Sur ce, à l'attaque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000370_GRAHATIA<tab>Not the barest trace of aether... Maybe there really is no way to bring them back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000370_GRAHATIA<tab>C'est bien ce qu'on pensait, plus une seule goutte d'éther dans ces créatures... Elles sont perrrdues à jamais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000380_PALAKASMAN<tab>Thank you for saving our lives once again!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000380_PALAKASMAN<tab>Merci, vous nous avez sauvé la vie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000390_PALAKASMAN<tab>I remember you, from Purusa. You helped us there, too, didn't you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000390_PALAKASMAN<tab>C'est bien vous qui nous avez secourus au temple du Purusa, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000400_ALISAIE<tab>Ah, you're from Palaka's Stand! I'm glad you're still in one piece.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000400_ALISAIE<tab>Mais oui, tu es de l'Écoute des Palaka<var 1D /var>! Contente de voir que tu vas bien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000410_ALISAIE<tab>...Or you will be, once I see to that injury of yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000410_ALISAIE<tab>Tu es blessée<var 1D /var>? Ne bouge pas, je vais te soigner.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000420_GRAHATIA<tab>Look out!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000420_GRAHATIA<tab>Attention<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000430_ALISAIE<tab>Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000430_ALISAIE<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000440_ALISAIE<tab>Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000440_ALISAIE<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000450_GRAHATIA<tab>Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000450_GRAHATIA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000460_GRAHATIA<tab>Get out of here, quickly!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000460_GRAHATIA<tab>Parrrtez d'ici, vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000470_GRAHATIA<tab>I won't lose them...not a one. This will be a brighter future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000470_GRAHATIA<tab>Ugh... Je ne te laisserai pas faire... Il y a trrrop de gens qui comptent sur nous...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000480_GRAHATIA<tab>I won't let a madman's apocalypse ruin everything we fought to achieve!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000480_GRAHATIA<tab>Apocalypse ou pas, je ne te laisserai pas rrruiner leurs espoirs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000490_ALISAIE<tab>Get it together, Alisaie! You're embarrassing yourself...and in front of Father, no less.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000490_ALISAIE<tab>Argh... Mince alors... C'est pas avec un genou à terre... que papa me verra voler de mes propres ailes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000500_ALISAIE<tab>You might never measure up to our champion...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000500_ALISAIE<tab>Ni que j'arriverai un jour à <var 1A 02 /var>sa<var 1A 01 /var> hauteur...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000510_ALISAIE<tab>But we ask too much of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> as it is. You mustn't let our sword in the darkness fight alone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000510_ALISAIE<tab><var 08 E905 ((Elle)) ((Lui)) /var> qui est <var 08 E905 ((devenue)) ((devenu)) /var> la lame d'Éorzéa... Et même <var 1A 02 /var>ma<var 1A 01 /var> lame... Je ne peux pas <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> laisser lutter <var 08 E905 ((seule)) ((seul)) /var> éter<var 16 /var>nel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000520_ALISAIE<tab>But we ask too much of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> as it is. You mustn't let Eorzea's hero fight alone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000520_ALISAIE<tab><var 08 E905 ((Elle)) ((Lui)) /var> qui est <var 08 E905 ((devenue)) ((devenu)) /var> la lame d'Éorzéa... Je ne peux pas <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> laisser lutter <var 08 E905 ((seule)) ((seul)) /var> éter<var 16 /var>nel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000530_ALISAIE<tab>Oh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000530_ALISAIE<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab><var 08 E905 ((Désolée)) ((Désolé)) /var> de t'avoir fait attendre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>You've done well in my absence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu t'es bien battue, Alisaie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>This is precisely why you should never skip your squat regimen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ça manque encore d'en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000540_ALISAIE<tab> Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000540_ALISAIE<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000550_ALISAIE<tab>I can look after myself, you know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000550_ALISAIE<tab>... J'avais la situation bien en main.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000560_GRAHATIA<tab>Everything's in order, I trust?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000560_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah, te rrrevoilà. <var 08 E905 ((Prête)) ((Prêt)) /var> à passer à l'action<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000570_ALISAIE<tab>I've had enough of this rabble. Come on!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000570_ALISAIE<tab>Débarrassons-nous de ce gêneur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000580_FOURCHENAULT<tab>You must board without delay. The ship will depart ere long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000580_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Montez vite à bord, nous allons bientôt décoller.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000590_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>Your offer to host us in Sharlayan is most appreciated, but will the Final Days not soon fall upon it as well?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000590_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>On va se réfugier à Sharlayan, maintenant<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce qui nous dit qu'on y sera à l'abri<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000600_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Your hesitation is not unwarranted. The satrap entrusted me with your lives, yet I have failed your comrades.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000600_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Bien que le satrape m'ait confié votre protection, je vous ai mis en danger et plusieurs d'entre vous ont même péri par ma faute. J'ai échoué, et je n'ai aucune excuse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000610_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Nor are you wrong to fear that this corruption will continue to spread. I cannot promise you complete safety, even in my homeland.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000610_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Dans le même temps, l'apocalypse continue de s'étendre à travers le monde, et je ne peux vous garantir que vous serez en sécurité, à Sharlayan ou ailleurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000620_FOURCHENAULT<tab>What I can promise is that I will do all in my power to protect you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000620_FOURCHENAULT<tab>En revanche, je peux vous promettre que je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour vous sauver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000630_FOURCHENAULT<tab>That power is not inconsiderable. Even now, my countrymen are preparing the vessel that will deliver us to a sanctuary on the moon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000630_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Si je veux vous emmener à Sharlayan, c'est parce que nous sommes à un cheveu de mettre au point un moyen de voyager vers la lune.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000640_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Join us on our journey there and beyond, to new horizons. Come to Old Sharlayan. Please.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000640_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Lorsque tout sera prêt, vous pourrez vous y envoler en compagnie des Sharlayanais et du matériel nécessaire pour commencer une nouvelle vie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000650_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>We would be fools to refuse such a generous offer made in earnest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000650_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>Merci, nous vous faisons confiance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000660_ALPHINAUD<tab>It seems they've a new destination.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vous avez donc décidé de changer de destination.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000670_FOURCHENAULT<tab>The people of Radz-at-Han have known too much suffering. The march to Garlemald will only bring them more, short though it may be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000670_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Le peuple de Radz-at-Han a déjà bien assez souffert. Même si Garlemald est proche, tenter de s'y rendre reviendrait à courir au massacre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000680_ALPHINAUD<tab>I quite agree. Fortunately, they have you to look after them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000680_ALPHINAUD<tab>En effet, cela serait très risqué. Je compte sur vous pour faire en sorte que tout se passe bien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000690_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Yes, well...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000690_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Tu as bien grandi, Alphinaud...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000700_JULLUS<tab>Behind you! Just there!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000700_JULLUS<tab>Regardez, là-bas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000710_ESTINIEN<tab>More of them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000710_ESTINIEN<tab>Décidément, ils refusent de crever, ceux-là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000720_ALPHINAUD<tab>Zenos!? Here!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000720_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Zenos<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000730_GRAHATIA<tab>You'll be all right. Hurry to the airship.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000730_GRAHATIA<tab>Tout va bien se passer, dépêchez-vous d'embarrrquer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000740_ALPHINAUD<tab>Why have you come?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000740_ALPHINAUD<tab>Qu'est-ce que tu viens faire ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000750_ZENOS<tab>A heretofore unseen beast. 'Twas ripe for the slaying.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000750_ZENOS<tab>Quand je vois une créature pour la première fois, je ne peux m'empêcher de la prendre en chasse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000760_ZENOS<tab>Poor sport, alas. Unfit to temper my blade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000760_ZENOS<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, quelle déception... Elle était si faible que j'ai à peine pu m'échauffer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000770_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, for the love of─ You cannot <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> be on about a rematch!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000770_ALISAIE<tab>T'échauffer<var 1D /var>!? Me dis pas que tu veux ta revanche, dans un moment pareil<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000780_ZENOS<tab>That is and has ever been my sole concern.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000780_ZENOS<tab>C'est la raison même pour laquelle je suis revenu à la vie, la seule et unique pensée qui occupe mon esprit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000790_ZENOS<tab>You, on the other hand, are fixated on a different quarry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000790_ZENOS<tab>... Cependant, je vois que tes yeux sont toujours braqués sur une autre proie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000800_ZENOS<tab>Your passion pales before mine, yet neither hate nor despair seem sufficient to recapture your misdirected bloodlust.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000800_ZENOS<tab>La flamme qui brûle en toi ne m'est pas destinée, et je n'y changerai rien, même en ensevelissant ce monde dans la colère et le désespoir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000810_ZENOS<tab>So I hone my blade, and I wait.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000810_ZENOS<tab>Je vais donc continuer à aiguiser mes crocs, en attendant patiemment de mériter ton attention.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000820_JULLUS<tab>That's it? That's all you care about?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000820_JULLUS<tab>Toi... Qu'est-ce que tu racontes<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000830_JULLUS<tab>Garlemald is in ruins. Our homeland─the nation you rule!─is as good as gone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000830_JULLUS<tab>L'empire de Garlemald est en ruines... Notre chère patrie... Le pays que tes ancêtres ont bâti<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000840_JULLUS<tab>Along with so many of its people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000840_JULLUS<tab>Notre fière capitale est détruite... Tant de nos frères et sœurs ont perdu la vie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000850_JULLUS<tab>Not just soldiers like us! Not only those who fought and killed for power and duty. Innocent civilians...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000850_JULLUS<tab>Nous autres soldats, on est préparés à mourir à la guerre. Mais as-tu seulement idée du nombre d'<var 1A 02 /var>innocents<var 1A 01 /var> sacrifiés durant ce conflit<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000860_JULLUS<tab>Murdered by their own flesh and blood. Lost and confused as they breathed their last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000860_JULLUS<tab>Des camarades, des familles... qui se sont entredéchirés sans même savoir pourquoi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000870_JULLUS<tab>While we who survived with our lives and minds intact were left to freeze to death!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000870_JULLUS<tab>Quant à ceux qui ont pu survivre en gardant toute leur tête, ils ont fini par mourir de froid<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000880_JULLUS<tab>The Eorzeans tell me all this was your doing. You slaughtered your countrymen. You did. For what?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000880_JULLUS<tab>Les gars de la délégation d'Ilsabard m'ont dit que t'étais responsable de tout ça. C'est vrai<var 1D /var>? Mais pourquoi, bon sang<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000890_ZENOS<tab>For nothing, in the end. So much wasted effort.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000890_ZENOS<tab>C'est la vérité même. Pour pas grand-chose, au final.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000900_JULLUS<tab>You...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000900_JULLUS<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000910_JULLUS<tab>You bastard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000910_JULLUS<tab>Zenos... Je vais te t...<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000920_ALPHINAUD<tab>For your own sake, Jullus, you must control your anger!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000920_ALPHINAUD<tab>Jullus<var 1D /var>! Tu dois garder ton calme<var 1D /var>! Pas pour Zenos, mais pour ton bien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000930_ALPHINAUD<tab>It will serve no one should it consume you and see you transformed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000930_ALPHINAUD<tab>Si tu te laisses envahir par la colère, tu pourrais te transformer en monstre, toi aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000940_JULLUS<tab>Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000940_JULLUS<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000950_ZENOS<tab>Would you be “happier” had I a “good reason”?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000950_ZENOS<tab>... Tu voulais une raison<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000960_JULLUS<tab>What?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000960_JULLUS<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000970_ZENOS<tab>If my motives met with your approval, would you no longer resent the outcome?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000970_ZENOS<tab>Tu m'as demandé “pourquoi<var 1D /var>?”... Comme si une raison allait t'aider à accepter la réalité qui se trouve sous tes yeux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000980_ZENOS<tab>If so, then perhaps a beast's skin would suit you better.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000980_ZENOS<tab>Si c'est le cas, tu n'es qu'une bête écervelée, qui ne mérite rien d'autre que d'être chassée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000990_ZENOS<tab>Duty...honor...morality...all constructs of convenience, when put to proof.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_000990_ZENOS<tab>Raisons, justifications... de simples outils pour écrire sa version de l'histoire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001000_ZENOS<tab>Surely the war taught you how easily power becomes the tool of the self-righteous?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001000_ZENOS<tab>Il en va ainsi partout dans le monde, et Garlemald n'est en rien différent. Combien de fois a-t-on vu des conflits dénués de sens brouiller la frontière entre le bien et le mal<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001010_ZENOS<tab>How the people's “justice” was merely a means to their ends?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001010_ZENOS<tab>Et la populace... Les gueux qui, comme toi et tes petits camarades, croient aveuglément en une justice qui n'est rien d'autre qu'une illusion...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001020_ZENOS<tab>Yet you would ask me why.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001020_ZENOS<tab>Et voilà qu'un de ces gueux me demande “pourquoi”... C'est d'un grotesque...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001030_ZENOS<tab>Ask any creature of this star and those above for answers, and they will tell you what suits their fancy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001030_ZENOS<tab>À quoi bon chercher chez les autres des raisons d'accepter la réalité<var 1D /var>? Tu auras beau remuer ciel et terre, tu ne trouveras que mensonge et opportunisme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001040_ZENOS<tab>And they would be right to do so. What meaning there is to be found in the petty vicissitudes of your existence must be gleaned by you and you alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001040_ZENOS<tab>Pour donner un sens à son existence, on ne doit jamais compter sur personne d'autre que <var 1A 02 /var>soi-même<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001050_ZENOS<tab>Should you seek it in battle─in the fruitless pursuit of my demise─then come. Assume your rightful place as a notch on my blade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001050_ZENOS<tab>Vas-y, pointe ta lame sur moi... Donne-moi une autre occasion d'aiguiser mes crocs...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001060_JULLUS<tab>You are a blight on the Garlean race, and there would be no more satisfying way to expunge it than by beating you to death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001060_JULLUS<tab>Ton existence même est une insulte à tous les Garlemaldais. Tu mériterais de subir au centuple la douleur de ceux qui ont souffert par ta faute.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001070_JULLUS<tab>But I will not be party to another tragedy. I refuse to lose anyone else because of you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001070_JULLUS<tab>Mais comme l'a dit Alphinaud, recourir à la violence ne ferait que provoquer une tragédie plus grande encore. Et moi, je ne veux pas perdre un camarade de plus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001080_JULLUS<tab>So go! Go, and may we never suffer your madness again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001080_JULLUS<tab>Va-t'en<var 1D /var>! Pars, et ne te montre plus jamais devant nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001090_ALISAIE<tab>Zenos!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001090_ALISAIE<tab>... Zenos<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001100_ALISAIE<tab>Perhaps you've found meaning in living this way─I cannot deny you've found strength.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001100_ALISAIE<tab>Tu as une conception bien tranchée de l'existence, et c'est ton droit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001110_ALISAIE<tab>Yet if you only pursue your hedonistic pleasures, and pay no heed to the plight of others, then no one will give you the time of day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001110_ALISAIE<tab>Mais si tu continues à mépriser tes semblables, tu resteras toujours dé<var 16 /var>ses<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>ré<var 16 /var>ment seul. Tu crois vraiment que quelqu'un se soucie de ta foutue revanche<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001120_ALISAIE<tab>You will never get what you want─not even the battle you pine for so dearly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001120_ALISAIE<tab>Au lieu de toujours te servir des autres pour ta propre sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion, tu devrais essayer de partager les plaisirs de la vie avec eux, ça te changerait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001130_ALISAIE<tab>You'll be alone for an eternity, and you'll deserve every agonizing second of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001130_ALISAIE<tab>Et si tu préfères rester comme tu es, alors profite bien de ta solitude et continue à t'attirer la haine du monde entier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001140_FOURCHENAULT<tab>We are ready to depart. The refugee ships will be leaving shortly, but I've asked mine to remain for the time being.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001140_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Les réfugiés sont sur le point de s'envoler, mais mon aéronef va rester stationné ici dans l'immédiat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001150_FOURCHENAULT<tab>There's room enough for you to join me on it, if you wish.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001150_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Si vous le désirez, vous êtes les bienvenus à bord.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001160_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Do contain your surprise. I needn't agree with the Scions' methods or intentions to acknowledge that their deeds are deserving of gratitude.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001160_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Sans l'in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>ven<var 16 /var>tion des Héritiers de la Septième Aube, qui sait ce qui aurait pu se passer<var 1D /var>? Même si nous ne partageons pas la même vision, votre aide est hautement appréciée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001170_ALPHINAUD<tab>We appreciate the offer, but might I ask why you are delaying your departure? I presume it is not solely for our benefit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nous vous remercions pour cette attention. Mais pourquoi votre aéronef ne décolle-t-il pas avec les autres<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001180_FOURCHENAULT<tab>I must visit Garlemald ere we return to Sharlayan. Having caused such an uproar, 'tis only meet that I explain myself to the Ilsabard contingent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001180_FOURCHENAULT<tab>J'ai l'intention de me rendre à Garlemald pour informer la délégation d'Ilsabard. Après ce qui vient de se passer ici, il en va de ma res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Allow us to accompany you, then. We should be glad to facilitate, given our familiarity with all concerned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans ce cas, permettez-nous de vous accompagner. Grâce à nos relations avec les deux parties, nous pourrons cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment nous rendre utiles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001200_ALPHINAUD<tab>If you would like to join as well, Jullus, we can speak of recent events on the way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Jullus, tu veux bien te joindre à nous<var 1D /var>? Je profiterai du trajet pour te raconter ce qu'on sait sur l'apocalypse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001210_ESTINIEN<tab>He'll be after your seat on the Forum next.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001210_ESTINIEN<tab>Voilà ce qui s'appelle “voler de ses propres ailes”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001220_LUCIA<tab>No major injuries then. Good.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001220_LUCIA<tab>Vous allez bien, quel soulagement<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001230_LUCIA<tab>I briefed the recovered soldiers and sent them on their way as quickly as I could, but nevertheless feared they would not make it in time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001230_LUCIA<tab>J'ai expliqué en urgence la situation aux soldats impériaux guéris en espérant qu'ils vous retrouvent à temps... On dirait bien que ça a marché.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001240_ALPHINAUD<tab>The additional support was invaluable. Your men saved more than a few lives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oui, ces renforts étaient un véritable don du ciel<var 1D /var>! Grâce à eux, de nombreuses vies ont pu être sauvées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001250_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Though not all, I regret to say.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001250_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, d'autres n'ont pas eu cette chance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001260_FOURCHENAULT<tab>I take it that I am addressing Lucia Junius? I am the Forum's envoy, Fourchenault Leveilleur.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001260_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Vous êtes bien Lucia Junius, re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tante de la délégation d'Ilsabard<var 1D /var>? Mon nom est Fourchenault Leveilleur, j'appartiens au Conseil de Sharlayan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001270_FOURCHENAULT<tab>And you are owed an explanation for these most dire developments.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001270_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Permettez-moi de tout vous expliquer...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001280_LUCIA<tab>Another trial wrought by the Final Days... I was beginning to suspect as much.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001280_LUCIA<tab>Je vois... Cette fois c'est sûr, ce sont des manifestations de l'apocalypse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001290_LUCIA<tab>You doubtless feel some consternation having been forced to abandon your original plan─but trust me when I say you were right to send the refugees elsewhere.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001290_LUCIA<tab>Même si la tournure des événements n'est pas celle que vous espériez, je suis convaincue que vous avez fait le bon choix en prenant en charge les réfugiés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001300_LUCIA<tab>Beasts have been sighted within the capital. Perhaps it was a stroke of grim fortune that the population was decimated beforehand, as they've yet to appear in any great number, but in time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001300_LUCIA<tab>À Garlemald aussi, des bêtes similaires sont apparues. Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment elles sont peu nombreuses, puisque la capitale est presque déserte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001310_LUCIA<tab>In any case, Maxima leads the remainder of the contingent in an effort to cull the creatures and evacuate the populace as we speak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001310_LUCIA<tab>Maxima est ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment sur place avec des effectifs de la délégation pour chasser ces monstres et organiser l'évacuation des rescapés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001320_LUCIA<tab>Once the airships have taken to the skies, I pray your men can be persuaded to join him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001320_LUCIA<tab>Jullus, que dirais-tu de les rejoindre avec tes camarades, une fois que tous les aéronefs auront décollé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001330_JULLUS<tab>You'll permit us to retain our weapons?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001330_JULLUS<tab>Vous avez décidé de nous faire confiance...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001340_LUCIA<tab>I wouldn't have sent you after the Scions were I expecting you to stab them in the back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001340_LUCIA<tab>Si je mettais en doute tes motivations, je ne t'aurais jamais demandé d'aller prêter main-forte aux Héritiers de la Septième Aube.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001350_ALPHINAUD<tab>And I, for one, would not consider past transgressions more relevant than future contributions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001350_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je te le demande aussi, de notre part à tous. L'apocalypse gagne du terrain d'heure en heure, et nous avons plus que jamais besoin de votre aide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Regardless of the circumstances that saw us at odds before, we need men of courage now. More than ever.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Le sang qui coule dans nos veines et les idéaux qui nous animent sont peut-être différents, mais le temps n'est plus au conflit. C'est en nous alliant que nous construirons notre futur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001370_JULLUS<tab>We swore to defend Garlemald. And so we shall.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001370_JULLUS<tab>Vous pouvez compter sur nous. Pour mes compagnons et moi, la protection de Garlemald a toujours été une priorité absolue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001380_FOURCHENAULT<tab>It seems you have everything under control. You will excuse me, then, for mine own duties await.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001380_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Très bien, il est temps que je retourne à mes res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>tés. Merci à tous pour votre précieuse coopération.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001390_ALPHINAUD<tab>A moment, Master Fourchenault.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001390_ALPHINAUD<tab>Juste une seconde, s'il vous plaît.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001400_ALPHINAUD<tab>You did desire to express your appreciation for services rendered, did you not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Si vous le permettez, j'aurais une faveur à vous demander...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001410_FOURCHENAULT<tab>I did... Though if you intend to again ask that Sharlayan alter its course, you will find my gratitude insufficient.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001410_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Si c'est pour me faire part de tes réserves au sujet de notre projet, je n'ai pas besoin d'en entendre davantage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001420_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis nothing so onerous.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Non... Au contraire, je voudrais profiter de cette occasion pour vous demander des éclaircissements.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001430_ALPHINAUD<tab>I wish to hear the details of this grand endeavor of yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001430_ALPHINAUD<tab>Le projet de Grand Exode de Sharlayan... J'aimerais que vous l'expliquiez en détail.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001440_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Do you swear to listen and to learn, and not to embark upon some scheme to impede us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001440_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Peux-tu me promettre que ta véritable intention n'est pas de nous faire obstacle<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001450_ALPHINAUD<tab>I swear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001450_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je vous en fais le serment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001460_FOURCHENAULT<tab>...Hmph. Any other I would doubt, but you I trust to keep your word. For not once have you broken it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001460_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Venant de quelqu'un d'autre, j'aurais beaucoup de mal à y croire... Mais depuis ton plus jeune âge, tu as toujours tenu ta parole.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001470_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Very well. I will request that the Forum make you privy to our plans. You may await our summons at the Baldesion Annex─assuming the decision is in your favor. Does that suffice?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001470_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Soit, je vais m'entretenir avec le Conseil à ce sujet. Si la réponse est positive, j'enverrai un messager chez les Élèves de Baldesion pour te prévenir. Es-tu satisfait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001480_ALPHINAUD<tab>It does. You have my thanks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001480_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oui, je vous remercie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001490_GRAHATIA<tab>Excellent! You can regale us with tales of your most recent sojourn to the First while we wait.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001490_GRAHATIA<tab>Parrrfait<var 1D /var>! Pour commencer, rentrons à Sharlayan. Je parie que tout le monde a hâte d'entendre ce qui s'est passé dans le premier reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001500_GRAHATIA<tab>Did you...hear something just now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001500_GRAHATIA<tab>Hmm<var 1D /var>? Vous n'avez rrrien entendu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001510_PUDDINGWAY<tab>(-???-)Pudding... Puuuddiiing...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001510_PUDDINGWAY<tab>(-???-)Pu... dding... Pu... dding... Pu... dding... Pu... dding...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001520_PUDDINGWAY<tab>Where, oh where, is this star's blasted pudding!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001520_PUDDINGWAY<tab>Où est le fameux flan de la planète bleue<var 1D /var>!? J'ai toujours rêvé d'y goûter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001530_GRAHATIA<tab>Um...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001530_GRAHATIA<tab>... Hein<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001540_URIANGER<tab>Dawn may banish even the darkest night...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001540_URIANGER<tab>(-Voix familière-)Je dis toujours que la lumière de l'aube peut bien dissiper la plus sombre des nuits...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001550_URIANGER<tab>And to this bitter clime bring warmth and comfort.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001550_URIANGER<tab>(-Voix familière-)... Mais je n'aurais jamais cru retrouver mes camarades Héritiers dans un endroit pareil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001560_URIANGER<tab>'Tis heartening to see such an assembly upon my return. I thought often of you whilst I looked down upon our star's brilliance from the moon above.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001560_URIANGER<tab>Bonjour, mes amis. Finalement, j'ai décidé de rentrer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001570_ALISAIE<tab>Yes, but what are you doing here? And dressed like that! Aren't you cold?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001570_ALISAIE<tab>Urianger<var 1D /var>!? Qu'est-ce que vous faites ici<var 1D /var>? Vous n'avez pas froid, habillé comme ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001580_URIANGER<tab>Verily. I fear for my health should I proceed to expound upon our purpose ere I procure more suitable garments...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001580_URIANGER<tab>C'est une longue histoire... Et oui, je suis frigorifié...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001590_LIVINGWAY<tab>Then allow me to summarize─we're here because none of you lot are up there! Nor has anyone deigned to send word about any changes in the plans!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001590_LIVINGWAY<tab>Malgré les manifestations de l'apocalypse, aucun être humain n'est encore venu se réfugier sur la lune<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001600_LIVINGWAY<tab>It's rude, is what it is. Least that's what I thought at first, but then folks got to wondering if you weren't in a spot of bother, so we decided to take matters into our own hands. Come down here and help, if our help be needed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001600_LIVINGWAY<tab>Comme personne ne nous a contactés, on s'est dit qu'il y avait peut-être eu quelques imprévus... Du coup, on est venus vous donner un petit coup de patte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001610_MAPPINGWAY<tab>So she says, but it's also something of a convenient excuse to visit Etheirys. Urianger made it sound absolutely marvelous. More so before the impending doom, but still.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001610_MAPPINGWAY<tab>Et puis, à force d'entendre les histoires d'Urianger au sujet d'Ætherys, on a eu envie de voir ça de nos propres yeux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001620_SINGINGWAY<tab>And it's not like there will ever be a better time! What with the aforementioned doom.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001620_SINGINGWAY<tab>Avec l'apocalypse qui s'annonce, c'est sûrement notre dernière chance de visiter cette planète avant qu'elle ne disparaisse com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001630_PUDDINGWAY<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Marvelous<var 1A 01 /var>, they say, yet not an onze of pudding to be found! I must suffer Urianger's inferior works no more...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001630_PUDDINGWAY<tab>Si Urianger dit vrai, on trouve plein de flans encore meilleurs que les siens, ici... Il faut absolument que je goûte ça...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001640_LIVINGWAY<tab>Hey! Maybe consider the plight of present company before you go blathering on about pudding and doom?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001640_LIVINGWAY<tab>Non mais dites donc<var 1D /var>! Il y a des façons de s'exprimer, enfin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001650_LIVINGWAY<tab>Ahem!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001650_LIVINGWAY<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001660_LIVINGWAY<tab>As I was saying─should you require any assistance with...whatever, we are at your disposal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001660_LIVINGWAY<tab>Je disais donc, quels que soient les projets des humains sur la lune ou ailleurs, nous sommes venus ici <var 1A 02 /var>pour nous rendre utiles<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001670_LIVINGWAY<tab>We were born from Hydaelyn's love for the lives of this star, so naturally we would much prefer to see them continue. Twiddling our thumbs up on the moon is hardly conducive to that, though, is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001670_LIVINGWAY<tab>Hydaelyn nous a donné naissance dans son profond désir de protéger la vie. C'est donc notre mission de vous accompagner dans cette épreuve, mais aussi notre plus grande joie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001680_LIVINGWAY<tab>Aye, not when you've all got such precious thoughts, and feelings, and hopes for the future, deserving of more active preservation. Speaking to Urianger made us realize that while we've carried out our duties to the letter, we've failed to fulfill them in spirit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001680_LIVINGWAY<tab>Seulement, la distance entre la terre et la lune est telle qu'il nous est impossible de vraiment comprendre votre manière de penser, ou comment vous vivez. Nous l'avons vivement ressenti en écoutant Urianger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001690_LIVINGWAY<tab>From there it was just a hop, skip, and a jump towards resolving to do better! So please, show us how. Help us help you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001690_LIVINGWAY<tab>Nous avons toujours eu envie d'en savoir plus, donc c'était l'occasion rêvée<var 1D /var>! S'il vous plaît, permettez-nous d'apprendre à votre contact, et n'hésitez pas à nous demander quoi que ce soit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001700_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Forgive me, but are they...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001700_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Excusez-moi, mais... qui sont ces créatures<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001710_URIANGER<tab>Thy distant collaborators, indeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001710_URIANGER<tab>Salutations, Messire Fourchenault. Je vous présente les Loporrites, vos collaborateurs de longue date sur la lune.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001720_LIVINGWAY<tab>Hail fellow well met! You'd be a member of the Forum, would you? It's an honor and a pleasure to meet you at last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001720_LIVINGWAY<tab>Vous appartenez au Conseil de Sharlayan<var 1D /var>? Il y a tellement longtemps que je voulais vous rencontrer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001730_LIVINGWAY<tab>I'm Livingway, Hydaelyn's right paw. That last bit is very important─as am I, if I may humbly say so myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001730_LIVINGWAY<tab>C'est moi, Livingway<var 1D /var>! Le bras droit d'Hydaelyn<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001740_FOURCHENAULT<tab>I, er...bid you welcome to our star, Livingway. On behalf of the Forum, I thank you for traveling such a distance to meet us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001740_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Aaah, mais bien sûr... Au nom du Conseil de Sharlayan, je vous souhaite la bienvenue sur terre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001750_FOURCHENAULT<tab>As you have surmised, preparations for the exodus have not proceeded as smoothly as we had hoped. I should be happy to personally escort you to our headquarters in Sharlayan, where you may advise us as you deem fit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001750_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Comme vous l'avez judicieusement deviné, nous rencontrons quelques difficultés pour préparer notre voyage vers la lune. J'aimerais d'ailleurs m'entretenir avec vous à ce sujet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001760_URIANGER<tab>'Twas with reluctance that I set aside the great work of readying the moon for habitation. Be assured that I did so only after the Loporrits made plain their earnest desire to come hither, and I myself felt a growing certainty that their contributions here would prove invaluable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001760_URIANGER<tab>Ne vous inquiétez pas, je n'ai nullement oublié ma promesse de rester sur la lune pour superviser la préparation de l'arche comme dernier recours.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001770_URIANGER<tab>'Tis trite, perhaps, but...I followed my heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001770_URIANGER<tab>Mais lorsque les Loporrites ont voulu visiter la terre, j'ai eu l'intime conviction que ce ne pourrait être que bénéfique. C'est dans l'intérêt supérieur de l'humanité que nous nous trouvons ici aujourd'hui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Good to haveth you back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vous nous avez tant manqué, Urianger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>May thy disciples banish this darkest of nights.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vos élèves ont bien progressé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001780_URIANGER<tab>For a time, at least. Nevertheless, 'twas worth the journey to find present company well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001780_URIANGER<tab>Je dois dire que je suis heureux de vous revoir tous en bonne santé. Je ne regrette pas d'avoir fait le voyage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001790_URIANGER<tab>Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001790_URIANGER<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001800_URIANGER<tab>I am no esteemed philosopher of eld. Nevertheless, 'tis my hope that what little knowledge I shared shall serve them well, and perchance help save us all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001800_URIANGER<tab>Je n'ai aucunement la prétention d'être un professeur émérite, mais j'ai fait de mon mieux pour leur donner une description fidèle de notre planète.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001810_URIANGER<tab>Wilt thou attend us at the Forum, and lend thine own wisdom?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001810_URIANGER<tab>D'ailleurs, pendant que Livingway et les siens s'entretiendront avec le Conseil de Sharlayan, je serai plus qu'enchanté de me joindre à vous de nouveau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001820_ALISAIE<tab>If that's all quite settled, can we start moving before Urianger catches his death? Even I'm freezing out here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001820_ALISAIE<tab>Rentrons vite nous abriter avant qu'Urianger ne prenne froid. Moi-même, je commence à avoir les orteils gelés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001830_GRAHATIA<tab>Oh, I daresay you'll warm up quickly once you're aboard the airship, sat shoulder to shoulder with our fur-covered friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001830_GRAHATIA<tab>Ne t'en fais pas, on va bien se tenirrr chaud avec tous ces Loporrites à bord de l'aéronef.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001840_ALPHINAUD<tab>There is a matter I wish to raise with you before we enter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001840_ALPHINAUD<tab>Avant d'y aller, j'ai une faveur à vous demander.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001850_ALPHINAUD<tab>We are here to listen and to learn─but if the Forum's plans are more or less what I expect, then I should like to make a proposal that will serve our ends...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001850_ALPHINAUD<tab>En fonction des révélations du Conseil, il se pourrait que je leur fasse une proposition importante pour la suite de nos projets.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001860_ALPHINAUD<tab>By your leave, of course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001860_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pourriez-vous me laisser mener la discussion<var 1D /var>? Faites-moi confiance, cela ne compromettra pas nos intérêts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001870_ALISAIE<tab>I don't see why not. Your words and wits have gotten us this far.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001870_ALISAIE<tab>Aucune objection de ma part<var 1D /var>! Après tout, c'est toi qui as réussi à convaincre notre père de nous accorder cette audience.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001880_KRILE<tab>Agreed. I will present our queries so that you may consider the most advantageous way to advance your proposal without distraction.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001880_KRILE<tab>Je me chargerai des questions que nous nous posons tous, comme ça tu pourras mettre tes pensées en ordre et te concentrer sur ton in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>ven<var 16 /var>tion finale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001890_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you, everyone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001890_ALPHINAUD<tab>Merci à vous tous...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001900_BARNIER<tab>If I may have your attention─the ad hoc session will now commence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001900_BARNIER<tab>Un peu de silence dans la salle<var 1D /var>! Je déclare ouverte cette session ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nelle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001910_BARNIER<tab>The purpose of today's assembly is to brief the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, at their request, on the great exodus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001910_BARNIER<tab>Comme vous le savez, l'objet de cette réunion est l'exposition de notre projet de Grand Exode aux Héritiers de la Septième Aube, conformément à leur requête.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001920_BARNIER<tab>You may enter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001920_BARNIER<tab>Veuillez entrer, je vous prie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001930_BARNIER<tab>On behalf of the Forum, I commend your heroic actions on the Magna Glacies. We shall not soon forget your service to us and the people of Radz-at-Han.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001930_BARNIER<tab>Pour commencer, j'aimerais vous exprimer la recon<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce du Conseil. Vous avez fait preuve d'un courage admirable pour protéger nos compatriotes et les réfugiés hannois des bêtes qui les ont attaqués dans le Magna Glacies.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001940_BARNIER<tab>The satrap, whom we have informed of the refugees' new arrangements, sings your praises as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001940_BARNIER<tab>J'en ai d'ailleurs informé le satrape de Radz-at-Han, qui m'a demandé de vous remercier pour votre bravoure et votre abnégation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001950_BARNIER<tab>As an expression of our gratitude, we will endeavor to answer your questions as fully and openly as we are able.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001950_BARNIER<tab>Le Conseil juge la situation actuelle ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment préoccupante, et c'est la raison pour laquelle nous avons accepté de vous recevoir aujourd'hui. Nous sommes prêts à répondre à vos questions en toute transparence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001960_KRILE<tab>Then let us begin.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001960_KRILE<tab>Merci. Pour commencer, j'aimerais m'assurer que nous sommes sur la même longueur d'onde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001970_KRILE<tab>First─it is the Forum's objective to ferry the life and knowledge of this star to the moon. Am I correct?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001970_KRILE<tab>Pouvez-vous nous confirmer que le but du Conseil de Sharlayan est d'organiser l'évacuation de l'humanité et de son savoir avant la destruction de la terre par l'apocalypse<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001980_FOURCHENAULT<tab>You are. It is for this purpose that Sharlayan has labored these many long years.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001980_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Exactement. Depuis de longues années, c'est en préparation de cette éventualité que s'articulent les activités de notre cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001990_FOURCHENAULT<tab>We have collected biological samples and scientific records from across the star. When the time comes, they will be moved from their places in Labyrinthos and Noumenon and conveyed to safety.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_001990_FOURCHENAULT<tab>La première étape de l'exode en lui-même est l'acheminement des con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ces du monde entier que nous avons accumulées dans le Labyrinthos et le Noumène.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002000_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Once that critical task has been accomplished, we will begin transporting the Sharlayan citizenry, which has been categorized into groups. The earliest arrivals are to ensure hospitable environs for those who come after.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002000_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Dans le même temps, le peuple sharlayanais sera réparti en plusieurs groupes qui seront transportés l'un après l'autre sur la lune, pour en aménager l'environnement et s'y établir progressivement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002010_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Following our people, we will send those of other nations in turn, beginning with our allies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002010_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Puis, lorsque ce sera possible, nous prendrons en charge les populations de nos alliés pour les conduire jusqu'à l'arche et leur permettre de s'y installer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002020_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Radz-at-Han was foremost among these, but since the Final Days have already come to Thavnair, we saw fit to include the refugees with earlier groupings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002020_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Les Hannois devaient faire le voyage en priorité, mais les premières manifestations de l'apocalypse sont apparues plus tôt que nous le pensions. Nous avons donc tenté de hâter leur évacuation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002030_YSHTOLA<tab>An ambitious plan. You have accounted for the safety of all nations and tribes, then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002030_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est un projet véritablement titanesque. Estimez-vous être en mesure de sauver toute l'humanité de cette façon<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002040_FOURCHENAULT<tab>...As many as we can.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002040_FOURCHENAULT<tab>... Dans la mesure du possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002050_YSHTOLA<tab>And how, pray tell, do you decide who to leave behind?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002050_YSHTOLA<tab>Et c'est le Conseil qui décide ce qui est “possible”, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002060_FOURCHENAULT<tab>To journey beyond the sky is an unprecedented and immeasurably difficult endeavor. Introducing sources of inevitable conflict would condemn all to certain death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002060_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Un exode d'une telle ampleur est un défi colossal, surtout à l'échelle interplanétaire. Prendre en compte des opinions extérieures et divergentes compromettrait sa réussite, ce que nous voulons éviter à tout prix.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002070_KRILE<tab>Questions as to the validity of that approach aside...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002070_KRILE<tab>... Mettons de côté ce débat et passons à un autre sujet, si vous le permettez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002080_KRILE<tab>Are your plans proceeding apace? We're under the impression that your primary means of celestial transportation is incomplete.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002080_KRILE<tab>J'aimerais aborder l'état d'avancement actuel du projet. D'après mes in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions, la question centrale du moyen de transport vers la lune n'est pas encore réglée. Qu'en est-il exactement<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002090_FOURCHENAULT<tab>If only in that it does not meet our optimal parameters, that is correct.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002090_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Dans la mesure où ce moyen de transport ne fonctionne pas encore con<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>na<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment, l'honnêteté exige d'admettre que ce problème reste en suspens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002100_FOURCHENAULT<tab>This ark, as some have taken to calling it, is fully operational and could be launched even today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002100_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Le vaisseau que nous avons passé tant d'années à élaborer puis à construire peut être considéré comme achevé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002110_FOURCHENAULT<tab>However, the Final Days have progressed more quickly than we anticipated.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002110_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Hélas, nous n'avions pas prévu que les effets de l'apocalypse se propageraient si rapidement au reste du monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002120_FOURCHENAULT<tab>At present, the ship is incapable of attaining speeds sufficient to meet our evacuation targets.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002120_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Ce qui nous amène à la partie motrice de l'appareil. La technologie que nous utilisons ne nous permet pas d'atteindre la vitesse requise, et le ra<var 16 /var>vi<var 16 /var>tail<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment en carburant nécessite un temps trop important.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002130_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Should we put the vessel into service as it is now, we will be unable to travel to the moon and back quickly enough to complete the necessary number of trips. Precious lives and knowledge will be lost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002130_FOURCHENAULT<tab>En l'état actuel des choses, nous sommes beaucoup trop lents pour faire suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment d'allers-retours avant que l'apocalypse ne ravage toute la planète. Nous allons au-devant de pertes immenses, aussi bien humaines que matérielles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002140_ALISAIE<tab>Seven hells... Is there anything to be done?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002140_ALISAIE<tab>... Il n'y a vraiment aucun moyen d'éviter ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002150_FOURCHENAULT<tab>The aetherburner─the primary means of propulsion once the craft is in the space between stars─is undergoing testing to determine whether it can be made more efficient.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002150_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Nous conduisons de nombreux tests pour tenter d'améliorer le réacteur à éthéro-dégénérescence, la partie du moteur qui sert à propulser le vaisseau dans l'espace.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002160_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Though cargo is being loaded for the initial phase of the exodus, we are prepared to continue our experimentation up to the day before launch should it prove necessary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002160_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Le chargement des mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses a déjà commencé pour le premier voyage, mais nous avons l'intention de peaufiner nos réglages jusqu'au tout dernier moment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>What if the Scions were to solve your problem?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans ce cas, que diriez-vous de passer un marché avec les Héritiers de la Septième Aube<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>We shall help devise a means to improve the aetherburner's efficiency─on two conditions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nous pourrions vous aider à améliorer votre réacteur, en échange de quoi nous vous demanderions deux faveurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>If we succeed, you must allow us to meet with Hydaelyn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>La première serait de nous accorder une entrevue avec Hydaelyn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002200_YSHTOLA<tab>'Twas simple enough to deduce. You have a concord, and so you would never have abandoned the Antitower had you no other means of communication.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002200_YSHTOLA<tab>Compte tenu de vos relations avec Hydaelyn, nous trouvons par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement étrange que vous laissiez l'Antitour à l'abandon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002210_YSHTOLA<tab>One far more convenient, I suspect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002210_YSHTOLA<tab>Vous avez forcément découvert un moyen plus efficace de communiquer avec elle...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002220_ALPHINAUD<tab>The second condition, also to be met upon our success, is that we be permitted to propose another use for your ark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002220_ALPHINAUD<tab>Passons à notre seconde requête. Nous aimerions vous suggérer qui se servira de votre vaisseau, et de quelle façon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002230_FOURCHENAULT<tab>We would be at liberty to refuse this proposal?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002230_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Une “suggestion”<var 1D /var>? Cela implique que nous ne sommes pas dans l'obligation de l'accepter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of course. If we cannot prove its merit to the ninety-nine here, who are we to stake on it the lives of all peoples of this star?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Exactement. Si notre proposition ne parvient pas à convaincre les quatre-vingt-dix-neuf membres du Conseil, ce sera la preuve qu'elle n'est pas pertinente.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002250_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Hahaha! Delightful as always, Master Alphinaud!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002250_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Ho ho ho... Voilà qui s'annonce intéressant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002255_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002255_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002260_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>We couldn't have asked for a finer plan. “Allow us to solve this complex engineering problem of which we were entirely unaware until moments ago. What could possibly go wrong?” Haha! The satire writes itself!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002260_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Une équipe de nouveaux venus qui s'attaque à un casse-tête technologique sur lequel nos plus éminents spé<var 16 /var>cia<var 16 /var>listes planchent depuis des années. C'est aussi absurde qu'excitant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002265_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002265_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002270_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Yet what field has not benefited from a change in perspective? When we are at wits' end, what we need is not the same dry theories recited ad nauseam, but fresh inspiration.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002270_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>C'est exactement ce qu'il faut à nos scien<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>ques. Un vent nouveau qui les ferait dévier de leurs vieilles théories surannées et sortir de l'impasse dans laquelle ils se trouvent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002280_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>I, for one, have faith in my erstwhile students to provide it. And I find their terms to be perfectly acceptable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002280_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>J'ai bon espoir d'être agré<var 16 /var>a<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment surpris par mes anciens élèves, et je vote en faveur de leur proposition.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002290_BARNIER<tab>Order! Order! We have no time to waste on debate. I call a vote.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002290_BARNIER<tab>Silence dans la salle<var 1D /var>! Le temps nous est compté, et nous devons décider d'une issue le plus vite possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002300_BARNIER<tab>All in favor of agreeing to the Scions' terms?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002300_BARNIER<tab>Que ceux qui veulent accepter les conditions des Héritiers de la Septième Aube lèvent la main<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002310_BARNIER<tab>Seventy-one in favor, twenty-eight against. The ayes have it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002310_BARNIER<tab>Je compte soixante et onze voix pour, vingt-huit contre... C'est un résultat sans appel, la proposition est acceptée par le Conseil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002320_BARNIER<tab>Fourchenault, as the architect of this project, you are the best candidate to show them its current state. ...And bear in mind that, regardless of your personal misgivings, this is the will of the Forum.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002320_BARNIER<tab>Messire Fourchenault Leveilleur, en qualité de dirigeant du projet de Grand Exode, c'est à vous que revient la res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té de guider ces gens. J'espère que vos objections per<var 16 /var>son<var 16 /var>nelles n'entraveront pas votre devoir de conseiller.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002330_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Very well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002330_FOURCHENAULT<tab>... Naturellement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002340_BARNIER<tab>I call this session to a close. Return to your tasks with urgency─the Final Days wait for none.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002340_BARNIER<tab>Mesdames et Messieurs, la séance est levée<var 1D /var>! Nous sommes près du but, aussi je vous demande de vous mettre im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment au travail<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002350_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>I could swap 'em out... No─been there, done that, damn near lost me eyebrows...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002350_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Voyons voir... Peut-être qu'en décalant cette valve... Non, j'ai déjà à peine la place de placer le joint...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002360_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Think, Kokkol, think! We'd be well on our way to paradise, visionaries pattin' themselves on the backs for their grand accomplishments if you'd only <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002360_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Aaah, bon sang, c'est pas vrai<var 1D /var>! C'est pas comme ça qu'on va réussir à envoyer ces gens dans l'espace en temps et en heure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002370_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Yes... That does sound rather lovely...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002370_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Désolé de vous interrompre, Messire Kokkol.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002380_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Gyaaah! ...I mean, Master Fourchenault, what a pleasant surprise! We're not blastin' off already, are we!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002380_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Aaah, Monsieur Fourchenault, qu'est-ce que vous faites là<var 1D /var>!? Pourquoi il y a tant de monde, tout à coup<var 1D /var>!? Ne me dites pas que le délai est déjà écoulé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002390_FOURCHENAULT<tab>The schedule remains unchanged. For better or worse...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002390_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Non, ne vous en faites pas. Même si nous sommes pressés par le temps, notre calendrier demeure inchangé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002400_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Which is why the Forum has elected to accept assistance in resolving the aetherburner conundrum.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002400_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Les personnes qui m'ac<var 16 /var>com<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>gnent sont ici pour vous aider à améliorer le réacteur à éthéro-dégénérescence, avec l'aval du Conseil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002410_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Huh. Not seen you lot down here before.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002410_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Ils sont nouveaux dans la profession<var 1D /var>? Leur tête me dit rien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002420_FOURCHENAULT<tab>There are Archons among their number, but engineering is not their expertise. Nevertheless, the Forum concedes the slim possibility that they may have insights to offer. If not, you are at liberty to return them to the surface...by whatever means you see fit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002420_FOURCHENAULT<tab>À vrai dire, même si certains d'entre eux sont des Preux, aucun n'est spécialisé dans votre domaine d'expertise. Nous espérons qu'ils vous permettront d'avancer, mais s'ils vous gênent, n'hésitez pas à les congédier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002430_ALPHINAUD<tab>I assure you that won't be necessary. Now, about your troubles with the aetherburner...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002430_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nous allons bien sûr faire notre possible pour vous aider dans votre travail. Pour commencer, pourriez-vous nous en dire plus au sujet de ce fameux réacteur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002440_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Aye, aye, I'll walk you through it. S'pose I could do with a change of pace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002440_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Pas de problème. Ça tombe bien, j'avais justement besoin de m'aérer les neurones.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002450_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>As the name ought to tell you, the aetherburner “burns” aether─ambient or otherwise─and transforms it into motive force. Think of it like a giant bomb that never stops explodin'.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002450_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Sans entrer dans les détails les plus complexes, le réacteur à éthéro-dégénérescence est la partie de notre vaisseau qui convertit l'éther en force de poussée pour lui permettre de se déplacer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002460_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Even out in that black void where the aether's right sparse, it's strong enough to move our ark. And it probably won't kill you like an actual bomb!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002460_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>L'éther est beaucoup moins abondant dans l'espace qu'à la surface de notre planète. Mais grâce à la technologie qu'on a développée, notre appareil est capable de faire l'aller-retour terre-lune.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002470_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>...But it ain't perfect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002470_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Le problème, c'est qu'il est encore beaucoup trop lent...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002480_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Accordin' to my calculations, to travel to the moon and back fast enough for the Forum's likin', the conversion rate needs to be six percent more efficient.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002480_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>D'après mes calculs, en augmentant le taux de conductivité éthéréenne de six pourcent, on pourrait atteindre la vitesse nécessaire pour faire le voyage aussi rapidement que l'exige le Conseil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002490_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>“A measly six percent,” you say, but if I could've squeezed even another “point six” out of it, don't you think I'd've built it that way in the first place!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002490_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Six pourcent, ça paraît peu comme ça<var 1D /var>! Mais quand on utilise les meilleurs matériaux pour chaque pièce, quand on a optimisé ses plans des centaines de fois, laissez-moi vous dire que c'est une véritable montagne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002500_URIANGER<tab>Hast thou consulted with the Loporrits?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002500_URIANGER<tab>Avez-vous sollicité l'avis des Loporrites à ce sujet<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002510_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Yes. They too are conducting their own research, for lack of a ready answer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002510_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Bien sûr. Ils travaillent comme nous d'arrache-pied sur le problème. Seulement, ils ne semblent pas être en mesure de trouver une solution dans l'immédiat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002520_FOURCHENAULT<tab>The moon's propulsion systems are considerable, naturally, yet they are commensurately massive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002520_FOURCHENAULT<tab>L'arche des Loporrites possède elle-même un puissant système de propulsion, mais il n'existe que grâce à l'immense espace qui lui est dédié au cœur de la lune.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002530_FOURCHENAULT<tab>It is no easy feat to convert their technology into an efficient means of propulsion for a “teeny-tiny toy boat,” as they say─and as I most certainly do not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002530_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Adapter un tel dispositif à l'échelle de notre vaisseau est inconcevable dans leur esprit, puisque, pour reprendre leurs mots, “il est à peine plus gros qu'un jouet”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002540_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Yes, exactly! Damn it all, I ask for refined adamantite and they send me uppity rabbits with inscrutable, ancient, incompatible technology... You tryin' to drive me mad?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002540_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Aaah<var 1D /var>! J'vous le dis, c'est mission impossible<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes bien gentils de venir m'aider, mais à moins que vous ayez de l'<var 1A 02 /var>exadamantium<var 1A 01 /var> dans vos sacs, c'est peine perdue<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002550_GRAHATIA<tab>Do you speak of <var 1A 02 /var>Allagan<var 1A 01 /var>-refined adamantite, perchance?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002550_GRAHATIA<tab>De l'exadamantium...<var 1D /var>? Comme on pouvait en trrrouver à Allag<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002560_YSHTOLA<tab>You know of it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002560_YSHTOLA<tab>Ça te dit quelque chose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002570_GRAHATIA<tab>Only in the most general terms, I'm afraid. 'Twas an alloy of Allagan make, but the secrets of its production were closely guarded.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002570_GRAHATIA<tab>Il s'agit d'un alliage créé par les Allagois. Son procédé de fabrication a toujours baigné dans le mystèrrre, si bien qu'on le qualifiait parfois de “métal miracle”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002580_GRAHATIA<tab>As I recall, the records stated it was vital to Dalamud's construction and launch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002580_GRAHATIA<tab>À l'époque, l'empire d'Allag s'en est serrrvi pour construire Dalamud, et son utilisation est mentionnée dans divers rapports sur sa conquête spatiale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002590_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Aye, that's the stuff! No material more conductive far as I know. Slottin' some in's like blowing up a dam and watching the river of aether come rushing through!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002590_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Ouais, c'est ça<var 1D /var>! L'exadamantium<var 1D /var>! Un métal légendaire né de techniques aujourd'hui oubliées et qui est devenu quasiment introuvable<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002600_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Ain't a living soul that knows how to make it, though.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002600_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Parmi ses propriétés supérieures, je vous le donne en mille... C'est un supra-conducteur pour l'éther<var 1D /var>! Je suis bien placé pour le savoir, j'en ai utilisé un peu pour le réacteur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002610_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>We were fortunate enough to salvage some for the aetherburner─just a wee bit, mind─from a chunk of Dalamud that came hurtlin' into the Northern Empty during the Calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002610_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Où je l'ai trouvé<var 1D /var>? Dans un morceau de structure de Dalamud qu'on a renfloué dans les mers du Nord. Il dormait sûrement là-bas depuis la fin du septième fléau, quand le satellite a volé en éclats.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002620_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>With more...well, that extra six percent efficiency would be child's play. It's a cryin' shame that we've no other sources.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002620_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Si je pouvais mettre la main sur un bon paquet de cet exadamantium, ce serait un jeu d'enfant d'atteindre les six pourcent qui nous manquent, croyez-moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002630_ALISAIE<tab>Surely the many shards of Dalamud scattered throughout Eorzea would suffice. Why not get the refined adamantite from them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002630_ALISAIE<tab>Il y a des morceaux de l'épave de Dalamud éparpillés à travers tout Éorzéa. Pourquoi vous n'iriez pas vous servir<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002640_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Oh we tried, believe you me. But only a few specialized pieces would've had any in 'em to begin with.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002640_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>On a déjà envoyé les glaneurs en chercher, tu penses bien<var 1D /var>! Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment c'est pas si simple, l'exadamantium est utilisé qu'en certains endroits précis dans la structure du satellite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002650_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Drive cores from Ragnarok-class internment hulks─those are the prize bits we really need.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002650_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>C'est uniquement dans ses protubérances semblables à des épines géantes qu'on peut en trouver. Plus précisément, il s'agit de l'unité motrice des vaisseaux de classe Ragnarok.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002660_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>But accordin' to the gleaners, gettin' to 'em means delvin' deep into the shards─and the defenses are still very operational and very eager to blow 'em up.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002660_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>D'après les éclaireurs qui ont inspecté le terrain, il faut s'aventurer au plus profond de la carcasse pour atteindre le métal, et l'endroit est infesté de dispositifs de sécurité allagois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002670_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>It's rough goin' in there, even for the cream. Not sure they'd make it out alive...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002670_KOKKOLDANKKOL<tab>Même pour une équipe de glaneurs triés sur le volet, je vous garantis que ça se fait pas en un claquement de doigts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002680_ALISAIE<tab>...Weren't we near that part of the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> when we went to destroy Bahamut?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_002680_ALISAIE<tab>Il parle de l'endroit où on est allés pour détruire Bahamut, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06005_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You want me to go and fetch the wotsits?
